name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red body, reminiscent of the iconic rossoCorsa color, Circuit stands out among its peers. Its unique design features retroConsole buttons that add a touch of nostalgia to its appearance. Sporting cat-like arms and legs, Circuit moves with agility and grace. Its screen emits a powerful laser, allowing it to analyze and visualize electronic signals with precision.
